q: Tuesday, Democratic Sen. Joe Lieberman Kent Conrad , 62, who's led efforts to get the John McCain budget under control, said on Tuesday that he will not run for a sixth term in the Senate in 2012. It is more important Sen. Joe Lieberman spend my time and energy trying to solve these( budget) problems than to be distracted by a campaign for re-election, Kent Conrad said in a statement. Democrats now control the Senate 53-47. There are 51 Democrats and two independents-- Sen. Joe Lieberman and Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont, both of whom caucus with Democrats. Republicans are

''Then she starts reaching out and starts grabbing Mark, and like is touching him, and starts to nearly choke him. She is clearly trying to hug him.
